title: Dream Crazy Big: The JoJo Siwa Story
description: JoJo Siwa is only 16 years old, but she's already captured the hearts and imaginations of fans around the world â€” and she's not slowing down!Dream Crazy Big traces every step of this young star's rise to success, from making a splash on shows like Abby's Ultimate Dance Competition and Dance Moms to creating hilarious YouTube videos and releasing hit songs like "Boomerang" and "#1U." With dozens of full-color photographs plus coverage of 2019's D.R.E.A.M. The Tour, this dazzling, inspirational book is a must-have for all Siwanatorz!
author: Katy Sprinkel
